greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Write exp(-x) = Product_{n>=1} (1 + g_n * x^n); a(n) = numerator(g_n).
link: H. Gingold, H. W. Gould, and Michael E. Mays, Power Product Expansions, Utilitas Mathematica 34 (1988), 143-161.
G. Helms, A dream of a (number-) sequence
maple: for n from 1 to M do t3:=coeff(t2,x,n); t2:=series(t2/(1+t3*x^n),x,L); g:=[op(g),t3]; od: g;
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 30 2010
